sentences.en: A group of boys and girls gathered around the campfire to sing songs.
sentences.cn: 一群孩子围着一堆篝火唱歌.

sentences.en: A group of boys and girls gathered round the campfire to sing songs.
sentences.cn: 一群孩子围着一堆篝火唱歌。

sentences.en: A group of elderly men in uniforms, eyes bright with reminiscence, are gathered at a Grand Army of the Republic campfire.
sentences.cn: 一群上年纪穿着制服的退伍老兵，围在伟大共和国军的营火旁边，眼神明亮地回忆着过去的光辉岁月。

sentences.en: Around the campfire they would narrate tale after tale.
sentences.cn: 他们围坐在营火旁说故事.

sentences.en: But it was a campfire, like this one.
sentences.cn: 但那仅仅是堆篝火, 就像这个一样.

sentences.en: Dead branches are good fuel for a roaring evening campfire.
sentences.cn: 枯树枝是喧闹的篝火中最好的燃料.

sentences.en: For when we build our campfire.
From far away, we saw the sparkle of a campfire.
sentences.cn: 我们从远处看到营火在闪耀.

sentences.en: It was dark, but they could see a campfire ahead.
sentences.cn: 里面很暗, 但是他们能看到前面有一堆篝火.

sentences.en: The black soot deposited on a kettle by a smoky campfire is nearly pure carbon.
sentences.cn: 带烟的营火在水壶上熏积的黑煤烟几乎是纯碳.

sentences.en: The campers lit torches from the campfire.
sentences.cn: 露营者用营火点燃火把.

sentences.en: The campfire smouldered for hours after the blaze died out.
sentences.cn: 营火在火焰熄灭后闷烧了好几个小时.

sentences.en: They damped down the campfire and then went to bed.
sentences.cn: 他们先将篝火封好,然后便去睡觉.

sentences.en: We are sitting by the campfire.
We sit and eat delicious food around a campfire at night.
sentences.cn: 夜里,我们坐在篝火周围,吃好吃的食品.

sentences.en: We warmed our hands near the blaze of the campfire.
sentences.cn: 我们在篝火的火焰旁暖手.

sentences.en: Yes, he knew how to make a campfire, of course he knew.
sentences.cn: 是的, 他知道如何燃起营火, 他当然知道的.

trans.tran_en: a fire made outdoors by people who are camping
